channel.title: Pub Pk - a server for veterans and newcomers
channel.description:
If you already like it, get it here [url=http://upx.nz/ympaO6]http://upx.nz/ympaO6[/url] - uppit [url=http://www.filedropper.com/pubpkclient_1]http://www.filedropper.com/pubpkclient_1[/url] This server is an oldschool rsps. It has the feel of original delta, bits and pieces of Dodian and others.
Are you tired of clicking at the same spot for hours, days or even months? Does flipping items gets boring after a while? Pub pk is all about entertainment, community interactions and ability to share your experience in rsps coding, managing and more with other people.
[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s13.postimg.org/a8ntt1yav/image.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/]upload pics[/url] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s17.postimg.org/p0lk6qfrz/image.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/]pic host[/url] All specs work, overloads, sara brews, npcs and so on... Pub Pk has no Nex gear, but provides ballanced items according to your needs!
Pub pk stands out because of the community. Its a place where you can do jut about anything! You can even advertise, sell or share your rsps files and discuss about great many things with others who you'll find are pretty good at this.
Join now and participate in far too many fun and unique events for me to describe here!
BUT I'M STILL NOT DONE!
This is a very new rsps so a few admin spots are open! I hope I posted this on moparscape org for a good reason. STILL NEED STAFF

item.description:
@tankjr wrote:

Since you’re the only one who has this problem i’d suggest clicking a few times on login. it happens sometimes and i tried downloading on another computer and playing. Everything worked

item.title: Pub Pk - a server for veterans and newcomers
item.dc:creator: @furyking50 furyking50
item.description:
@furyking50 wrote:

tankjr:

thank you very much! We’re still looking for staff (we don’t have mods, only admins to keep the order)

Won’t play until you change the download link to somewhere else

Use Mega, Dropbox, Uppit, MediaFire… why do people use junk like that?

Read full topic

This server is an oldschool rsps. It has the feel of original delta, bits and pieces of Dodian and others.

Are you tired of clicking at the same spot for hours, days or even months?
Does flipping items gets boring after a while?

rsps coding, managing and more with other people.


upload pics

All specs work, overloads, sara brews, npcs and so on…

Pub pk stands out because of the community. Its a place where you can do jut about anything! You can even advertise,
sell or share your rsps files and discuss about great many things with others who you’ll find are pretty good at this.

Join now and participate in far too many fun and unique events for me to describe here!

BUT I’M STILL NOT DONE!
